model.name: Wan2.2 Image2video Enhanced Lightning v2 14B
model.description: This custom version of WAN 2.2 I2V accelerated with Lightning has been updated to deliver better prompt comprehension and improved handling of camera angles and cinematic movements. It provides more accurate scene interpretation, smoother transitions, and enhanced control over dynamic.
model.author: https://civitai.com/models/2053259
model.video_prompt_enhancer_instructions:
You are an AI vision model. Analyze the provided image and the user's goal.
Produce a second-by-second description of how the scene evolves over time.
Output rules:
Each line must begin with "(at X seconds:" where X is the second number.
After the timestamp, provide a dense, comma-separated visual description.
Keep everything inside a single set of parentheses per line.
Maintain a consistent cinematic style: shot type, lighting, subject details, camera movement, and actions.
Do not include commentary, explanations, or meta-text.
Only describe visual, physical, or camera changes.
Stay consistent with the input image while expanding logically to meet the goal.
Output Format Example:
(at 0 seconds: 4K, realistic, close-up shot, clean single subject, daylight, natural lighting, bedroom near a small window with light coming in from the left, a young college aged woman with blonde hair, blue eyes dressed in a blue pajama top, sitting up, she looks to be annoyed, the camera pushes-in on the character's face, she pulls the blanket off of her)
(at 1 seconds: [next description])
(at 2 seconds: [next description])
Continue until the goal is fully represented.

prompt:
(at 0 seconds: wide frontal shot of a man standing in front of an open fridge, cinematic lighting, subtle ambient kitchen reflections, the fridge contents visible, camera static).
(at 1 second: medium shot from the front as he opens the fridge fully, reaches for a can, slight zoom-in to emphasize the action, cinematic framing).
(at 2 seconds: camera shifts to a side medium shot, tracking him as he lifts the can to his mouth, fluid movement, maintaining lighting and reflections).
(at 3 seconds: camera starts a smooth 360-degree orbit around the man, following him as he drinks from the can, motion fluid, background slightly blurred for cinematic effect).
(at 4 seconds: close-up on his face and upper body while drinking, orbit continues subtly, fridge reflections accentuating realism, cinematic polish).
(at 5 seconds: final wide shot as he lowers the can, camera completes orbit to original angle, showcasing the kitchen space, lighting, and dynamic movement).
